TEXT.S: Armenia I tini i 40 00 N, 45 00 E, i Asiya ko Armeniya, i kawali no Turki . Polong no sekalay i 29,743 km2, saka 143 ko katata'ang i hekal. O sekalay no sera i, 28,203 km2, no nanom a sekalay i, 1,540 km2. Polong i 3,051,250 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 59.70 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 9.10 , malo no roma to a sera 31.20 . siyoto O [[[Yerevan]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad, i saka 9 folad, 21 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Serzh Azati Sargsyan , patirengan a romi'ad i 2008 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 9 a romi'ad. Talihafan CIA List of current heads of state and government
